title: 4 States Fight To Restore Offshore Wind Projects … Wait, Where Is Virginia?
description:
Mystery swirls over the classified DoD intel that led to an emergency work stoppage at five new wind farms in mid-construction.

The post 4 States Fight To Restore Offshore Wind Projects … Wait, Where Is Virginia? appeared first on CleanTechnica.
